PSCT.Vegas:
① If a Beast-Warrior "Bujin" monster you control is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: 
You can send this card from your hand to the GY; negate the attack, and if you do, 
your opponent takes damage equal to half that face-up attacking monster's ATK. 
(You can only use the effect of "Bujingi Crow" once per turn).
PSCT.Meadowlands:
